translations: n.酒师；侍酒师；斟酒服务员（sommelier 的复数）

phrs.translation: 酒师, 侍酒师, 品酒师系列
高级侍酒师理事会, 侍酒师大师理事会, 侍酒师大师协会, 侍酒师协会

sentences.sentence: All this has some sommeliers trembling in their speckless black shoes.
sentences.translation: 这使得一些穿无点黑鞋的酒侍们瑟瑟发抖。

sentences.sentence: All this has some sommeliers trembling in their speck less black shoes.
sentences.translation: 这使得一些穿无点黑鞋的酒侍们瑟瑟发抖。

sentences.sentence: Some restaurants even hire wine sommeliers who have special knowledge about water, whisky and cigars.
sentences.translation: 有些餐厅会雇请专事服务水、威士忌、雪茄的侍酒师。
